Question.Subject: 'Watch This Item' link on eBay is not working?
Question.Content: I click on it and it does nothing. Absolutely nothing. It's only been like this for a few hours and I've tried signing out and signing back it but that didn't change it. WTF? It's been a few days now and still nothing. I can't leave feedback either. This has never happened before.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Yeah its a ebay glitch, sometimes it works, other times well you know the answer.
Edit - Have you tried deleting cookies, temp int files, clearing the cache all that sort of stuff.? I have seen problems identical to yours on ebays community forums. Maybe you could try ebays live chat if the above doesnt help.

Answer.Content:
Yeah its a ebay glitch, sometimes it works, other times well you know the answer.
Edit - Have you tried deleting cookies, temp int files, clearing the cache all that sort of stuff.? I have seen problems identical to yours on ebays community forums. Maybe you could try ebays live chat if the above doesnt help.
